casebody.data:
April 3, 1970

No. —■.

Board of Public Instruction, Manatee County, Florida, et al. v. Harvest et al. William C. Cramer, pro se, and for other applicants. Jack Greenberg, James M. Nabrit III, and Earl M. Johnson in opposition.

C. A. 5th Cir. Application for stay and other relief, presented to The Chief Justice, and by him referred to the Court, denied.
